ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: To enable users to easily install and run macOS as a virtual machine on Proxmox VE, effectively creating a Hackintosh within a virtualization platform.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Easy installation of macOS on Proxmox VE â€¢ Support for AMD and Intel hardware â€¢ Wide range of macOS versions supported (High Sierra to Sequoia) â€¢ Support for Proxmox VE versions 7.XX to 8.XX â€¢ Includes OpenCore version 1.0.4
ðŸ“– Summary: This repository provides a streamlined script to install and run macOS virtual machines on Proxmox VE, supporting a wide range of macOS and Proxmox versions on both AMD and Intel hardware. It simplifies the complex process of Hackintoshing within a virtualization environment.
